events.message: The customer has reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving a rear-end collision while stopped at a red light.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on customer report and initial details of the vehicle involved.
A claims agent with expertise in auto incidents was assigned to the case to ensure prompt and accurate handling of the situation.
The customer received confirmation that their claim regarding the vehicle collision has been acknowledged and is under review.
Request sent to the claimant for all relevant documents including police report, photos of the damage to the vehicle, and repair estimates.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including the official police report and comprehensive photos of the damage.
An investigation has been initiated to verify the details of the accident and assess the extent of damage to the claimant's vehicle.
The investigation team completed the review and confirmed that the claim is valid with damage consistent with the reported collision.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the claimant to cover repairs and other costs related to the car accident.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the timely response from the claims team.
Claim approval was finalized following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer, authorizing immediate payment.
Payment for the approved amount has been issued to the claimant to cover the damaged vehicle repair costs.
The claim case has been officially closed after successful completion of all procedures and payment issuance.
All case files and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
